scripts.build: npx esbuild js/admin.js js/guest.js --bundle --minify --outdir=dist && node -e "const fs = require('fs-extra'); fs.copySync('index.html', 'dist/index.html'); fs.copySync('dashboard.html', 'dist/dashboard.html'); fs.copySync('assets', 'dist/assets'); fs.copySync('css', 'dist/css'); console.log('✅ Build completed for Vercel');"
scripts.build:public: npm run build && node -e "const fs = require('fs-extra'); fs.ensureDir('public').then(() => Promise.all(['assets', 'css', 'dist', 'index.html', 'dashboard.html'].map((f) => fs.copy(f, 'public/' + f)))).then(() => console.log('✅ Successfully!'));"
